嚾嚾嚾
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

嚾字的基本解释

嚾
huàn
古同“唤”，呼唤。

嚾
huān
喧嚣，喧哗：“怨言嚾流。”

嚾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huàn］
［《廣韻》火貫切，去换，曉。］
呼唤。
[②]［huān］
［《集韻》呼官切，平桓，曉。］
(1)喧嚣。
(2)同“歡”。参见“嚾2呼”。

嚾字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　嚾； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页214第27
【廣韻】火貫切【集韻】呼玩切，?音渙。【玉篇】與喚同。【大戴禮】咀嚾者，九竅而胎生。【集韻】或作讙。　又【集韻】吐玩切，音彖。召呼。　又【集韻】【正韻】?呼官切，音歡。與?同。呼也。【正韻】喧囂貌。【荀子·非十二子篇】世俗之溝猶瞀儒，嚾嚾然不知其所非也。【後漢·禮儀志】因作方相，與十二獸舞嚾呼。

嚾字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
嚾字的起名意思

暂无。

Hum
Basic explanation of words
Hum
huàn
Gu Tong "call", call.
Hum
huān
Hustle, clamor: "Complaints wailing."
Hum
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huàn］
["Guangyun" fires all over, go and change, Xiao. ]
call.
[②]［huān］
["Ji Yun" Call the official cut, Ping Huan, Xiao. ]
(1) Hustle and bustle.
(2) Same as "Huan". See "嚾2 Hu".
Hum
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　嚾; Kangxi strokes: 21; page number: page 214 27
[Guangyun] Huoguanqi [Jiyun] Huwanqie,? Yinhuan. [Jade articles] Same with Huan. 【Big Wearing Ceremony】Those who are wailing will be born with nine orifices. [Ji Yun] or as a scorpion.　[Jiyun] spit, play and cut, the sound is loud. Call.　[Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Call the official cut, Yin Huan. Same as? Call it too. [Zheng Yun] Noisy appearance. [Xunzi·Fei Twelve Sons] The secular ditch is still a Confucianist, but I don’t know what it is. [Later Han·Etiquette] Dancing with the twelve beasts because of the appearance.
